item.title: Understanding the "src" folder
item.description: Understanding the “src” folder The main idea when doing the 1.7 release was to use Symfony as a replacement for our own PrestaShop framework. In “src” folder you’ll find 3 main folders with different purposes: Core: the refactored classes or business logic extraction for PrestaShop 1.7; Adapter: the classes that still depends on legacy framework (Context, Dispatcher or constants for instance); PrestaShopBundle: the classes that acts as a glue between PrestaShop classes and Symfony Core .
